main_features.description: Scrapes the index of EU tenders and extracts details, handling pagination and PDF validations.
Manages a PostgreSQL database for storing tender data with fields like name, sector, description, etc.
Provides RESTful API endpoints to interact with the scraped data through CRUD operations.
Displays a dashboard for monitoring system status, scraping statistics, and tender results.

technical_stack.description: Framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+ based on standard Python type hints.
Python SQL toolkit and Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) system.
Framework for extracting data from websites using Python.

corrective_actions.action_taken: Ensure that the 'Task' model is correctly defined in 'app/models.py' and that there are no typos.
